name: Green Bear
description:
Green Bear

2D platform games directed by MICHEL Michael with Unity 2018, Photoshop CC 2014 and Steinberg Cubase 5. The goal of the game is found a key in each level to open the exit door, the player will have to face various mechanisms and enemies to achieve the exit of the level. Good game.

http://qiwogames.alwaysdata.net/
